EmailTemplate.description: PSA-CLD-IQVIAPSA-1224 Sanofi-Galen Aggregate Reporting Completion Email
EmailTemplate.name: AGG ET02 PSA SG Completed Report Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: ACTIVITY COMPLETED: {!Aggregate_Report__c.Task_Type__c} in {!Aggregate_Report__c.Global_Business_Unit_GBU__c} has been marked as Completed in the PSA Tracker
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Task type: {!Aggregate_Report__c.Task_Type__c} for Product Name(s): {!Aggregate_Report__c.Sanofi_Products__c} . {!Aggregate_Report__c.Activity_DetailsEvent_Name__c} having a DLP: {!Aggregate_Report__c.DLP_Reporting_Period_End__c} has been marked as Completed on Date: {!Aggregate_Report__c.LastModifiedDate} in the PSA Tracker. PVS completion date was {!Aggregate_Report__c.PVS_Completion_Date__c}, GSO completion date was {!Aggregate_Report__c.GSO_Completion_Date__c} and Client Final Draft Sent was {!Aggregate_Report__c.Client_Final_Draft_Sent__c}.
